text:
@SouthernOracle4 "Or somewhere very like it..."

"Well, well," he added.

passages.source_name: So Long And Thanks For All The Fish
passages.full_quote: "<used>Or somewhere very like it..." "Jet la</used>g," muttered one of his friends
"I'm sure I heard abo<used>ut it..." "Well, well," sa</used>id Granny, calmly

passages.source_name: So Long And Thanks For All The Fish

passages.full_quote: "Ah <used>well, ah well," he </used>added, "I was only trying to fulfill my function."
